Sequence Information.Target Organism: V. cholerae (Ki values of 340 nM), S. typhimurium (Ki values of 350 nM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Sialidase inhibitor. Competitively inhibits bacterial sialidases, but not viral sialidaseS. Does not inhibit glycosidases or proteaseS. Has no antitumor activity.

Literature.Title: Asteropine A, a sialidase-inhibiting conotoxin-like peptide from themarine sponge Asteropus simplex.
Literature.Author: Takada K., Hamada T., Hirota H., Nakao Y., Matsunaga S. , van Soest R.W.M. , Fusetani N.
